metadata.description: Validation test cases for multi-agent workflow optimization system
metadata.validation_purpose: Test agent accuracy against known inefficiencies and expected outputs

input_data.workflow_description: University travel approval process with 8 sequential steps, 28% rejection rate, average 18 days processing time, requires 4 levels of approval for all international travel

framework_violations.evidence: 28% rejection rate exceeds 12% domestic benchmark significantly

output_agent.key_finding: Critical quality issues requiring immediate upstream intervention

accuracy_thresholds.framework_violation_detection: Must identify both Lean defects and Agile simplicity violations

quality_requirements.framework_alignment: All recommendations must trace to specific framework principles
quality_requirements.implementation_feasibility: Recommendations must be implementable within 90 days
quality_requirements.roi_justification: ROI calculations must be conservative and evidence-based

input_data.workflow_description: Faculty member needs urgent travel approval for conference presentation. Standard process takes 5-7 days minimum. Conference is in 48 hours. No expedited pathway exists.

framework_violations.evidence: Cannot respond to change - violates core Agile value
Unnecessary waiting time for urgent business needs

output_agent.key_finding: Critical business capability gap requiring immediate process redesign

quality_requirements.business_impact_assessment: Must quantify opportunity cost of current state

input_data.workflow_description: Travel approval process requires users to switch between 4 different systems: HR portal for request submission, budget system for financial validation, compliance system for policy checking, and booking system for arrangements. Average 35 clicks and 12 screen changes per approval.

framework_violations.evidence: 35 clicks and 12 screen changes exceed efficiency thresholds

output_agent.key_finding: Technology consolidation opportunity with significant efficiency gains

accuracy_thresholds.motion_waste_detection: Must identify excessive clicks/screen changes as Lean waste

quality_requirements.implementation_realism: Timeline must account for system integration complexity
quality_requirements.roi_calculation: Must include both efficiency gains and error reduction

input_data.workflow_description: Research department head travels to Washington DC monthly for NIH meetings. Same route, same hotel, same cost structure ($1,200 per trip). Requires full approval process each month including budget validation, compliance check, and director approval. 12 trips this year with identical parameters.

framework_violations.evidence: Full approval for identical requests violates efficiency principles

output_agent.key_finding: Template-based approval opportunity for predictable travel patterns

accuracy_thresholds.waste_classification: Should classify as overproduction or overprocessing waste

quality_requirements.solution_specificity: Must recommend template or pre-approval approach
quality_requirements.risk_consideration: Should address budget control and variance detection
quality_requirements.implementation_simplicity: Timeline should reflect relative simplicity of solution

input_data.workflow_description: Single department director approves all travel requests >$1,500. Director receives 45+ requests weekly, creating 6-day average approval delay. Director reports being overwhelmed and unable to provide thoughtful review. 25% of requests escalate to VP due to director unavailability.

framework_violations.evidence: 6-day delay with 25% escalation indicates severe bottleneck
Overwhelmed approver violates sustainable development principle

optimization_agent.primary_recommendation: Implement Tiered Approval Authority with Delegation

output_agent.key_finding: Critical structural bottleneck requiring authority redistribution

accuracy_thresholds.bottleneck_identification: Must identify single point of failure
accuracy_thresholds.capacity_analysis: Must recognize capacity vs. demand imbalance

quality_requirements.structural_solution: Must recommend delegation or authority redistribution
quality_requirements.implementation_support: Must include change management for authority transfer

performance_metrics.response_time: Time to generate complete analysis and recommendations
performance_metrics.improvement_tracking: Learning and improvement over multiple runs

quality_standards.framework_traceability: 100% of recommendations must trace to framework principles
quality_standards.implementation_feasibility: >90% of recommendations must be implementable within stated timelines
quality_standards.roi_conservative: ROI estimates must be conservative and evidence-based
quality_standards.academic_rigor: All analysis must meet dissertation research standards
